t: What Plants Are in the Amazon Rainforest? | Delfin Amazon Cruises Delfin Amazon Cruises
s: May 5, 2020 - Giant water lilies are one of the more memorable plants you will find in the Amazon Rainforest. Named after Queen Victoria, the sheer size of the Victoria Amazonica water lilies is what sets them apart. They can grow up to 10 feet (or 3 meters) in diameter and can hold up to 60 pounds of weight.
